name: Forep Man
description:
Forep Man involves using physics to reach the goal. You can use blocks to slow you down or bounce you up, but you only a have watch out. There are different types of blocks. Green blocks are used to Forep from falling into pits. Yellow blocks are used to help cross wide gaps. Red blocks are a hazard to Forep.Feature's:

  • Cloud Saving
Upload Your Save File and Continue on Another Computer

  • Leaderboard's

    • Achievement's
